text:
Bust out the big hats and bright outfits: The 2017 Kentucky Derby is officially here!

If you haven’t marked it on your calendars yet, some of the best horse races are about to go down…

from E! Online (US) – Top Stories http://ift.tt/2q6CeIh
title: Tom Sandoval and Ariana Madix’s Guide to the Kentucky Derby: How to Eat, Drink and Party All Weekend Long
